meanings.definition: Having both male and female characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The androgynous model showcased a blend of masculine and feminine features.
meanings.sent2: The artist's androgynous style appealed to a wide audience.
meanings.sent3: The androgynous outfit made everyone do a double-take at the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her androgynous appearance challenged traditional gender norms.
meanings.sent5: The androgynous character in the movie left a lasting impression on viewers.

meanings.definition: Being neither distinctly masculine nor feminine.
meanings.sent1: The mannequin displayed an androgynous look with its neutral clothing.
meanings.sent2: Their androgynous voice made it hard to determine their gender over the phone.
meanings.sent3: The androgynous hairstyle gave them a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent4: The androgynous scent of the perfume appealed to both men and women.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in an androgynous style, blending elements of both genders.
